id.description: The unique identifier of the board.

name.description: The name or title of the board.

board_kind.description: The type or category of the board.

type.description: The type or category of the board.

archived.description: Indicates if the column is archived.

description.description: The description or details of the column.

id.description: The unique identifier of the column.

settings_str.description: String representation of the column settings.

title.description: The title or name of the column.

type.description: The type of data represented in the column.

width.description: The width configuration of the column.

communication.description: Communication related data for the board.

description.description: The description or details of the board.

archived.description: Indicates if the group is archived.

color.description: The color associated with the group.

deleted.description: Indicates if the group is deleted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the group.

position.description: The position or order of the group.

title.description: The title or name of the group.

id.description: The ID of an owner of the board.
The ID of the creator of the board.

state.description: The state or status of the board.

id.description: The ID of a subscriber to the board.
The unique identifier of a tag associated with the board.
The ID of the top group associated with the board.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the board was last updated.

updated_at_int.description: The timestamp when the board was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier of an update related to the board.
The unique identifier of a view associated with the board.

name.description: The name or title of the view.

settings_str.description: String representation of the view settings.

view_specific_data_str.description: String representation of view specific data.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

name.description: The name or title of the workspace.

kind.description: The kind or type of the workspace.

description.description: The description or details of the workspace.
